scripts.install: cd gserver && npm i && cd ../gclient && npm i
scripts.patch: cd gserver && npm version patch --no-git-version && cd ../gclient && npm version patch --no-git-version
scripts.minor: cd gserver && npm version minor --no-git-version && cd ../gclient && npm version minor --no-git-version
scripts.publish: cd gserver && npm run compile && npm run test && cd ../gclient && npm run publish
